entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 09:38 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h then southwest 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
